---
title: "Forecasted Delta T"
---

Below are Delta T forecast maps for North Dakota from today through the next six days. These are derived from National Weather Service hourly forecasts and are not an official NWS forecast product.

Visit the [National Weather Service](https://www.weather.gov/) to access the local forecast for your area. Check [NDAWN.org](https://ndawn.ndsu.nodak.edu/current.html), [NDAWN.info](https://ndawn.info/), or the [NDAWN Inversion](https://www.ndsu.edu/agriculture/ag-hub/ndawn-inversion) app for the latest local weather conditions.

```{r}
#| include: false
require(fs)
require(purrr)
require(lubridate)
require(stringr)

imgpaths <- map(
  0:6,
  \(x)
   dir_ls(path = "./maps", regexp = str_c("forecast-delta-t-", Sys.Date()+days(x))) |>
   path_rel()
  ) |> 
  set_names(str_c("d",0:6))
```
